TopicTitle: BDArmory plus all turrets activating when one selected

Articles.Content: I just upgraded to BDArmory plus (with bda expansion) and I have a tank with .50 cal turrets and hydra 70 launchers. Whenever I select the .50 cal turrets from the weapon manager, the hydra turrets activate too. They dont shoot but they extend and follow the crosshair. Is this supposed to happen? And is there a way to turn it off? It wasnt like that in bda continued…
